title: Call an Action with the Object
description: This program uses the math library and creates a Math object. However, it does not call an action. Call a Math action that calculates 10 to the power of 3. Then run the program and check your answer.
hint: The correct block uses the object name followed by the colon symbol (i.e. :), the action name, and any parameters the action might need to work to call an action. In this case, the action is named RaiseToPower(value, power) where the first value in the parentheses is the value 10 and the second is the power of 3.
